security: Revealing the identities and roles of AMCHIP/1 and ANLASH/2 would jeopardize their safety and compromise ongoing intelligence operations. Specifically, the line referencing ANLASH/2 due to return to Havana and have a "good position" reveals details about a sensitive placement. The authorization for 'unilateral recruitment in place' also exposes operational tactics.
summary: A message indicates that ANLASH/2 is scheduled to return to Havana to assume a 'good position' in the office of Vice Minister Arnold Rodriguez, as reported by AMCHIP/1.
summary_one_paragraph: This message, dated March 15, 1965, relays information received by AMCHIP/1 in New York from ANLASH/2, who is reportedly returning to Havana around April 6 to take a 'good position' within Vice Minister Arnold Rodriguez's office. The message also notes headquarters' agreement to unilateral recruitment in place.
title: Peruen
